cast.overview: After more than thirty years of service as one of the Navy’s top aviators, and dodging the advancement in rank that would ground him, Pete “Maverick” Mitchell finds himself training a detachment of TOP GUN graduates for a specialized mission the likes of which no living pilot has ever seen.
cast.title: Top Gun: Maverick

cast.overview: On the night of her college graduation, Natalie's life splits into parallel realities after she takes a pregnancy test. What will life and love bring?
cast.title: Look Both Ways

cast.overview: Stranded at a rest stop in the mountains during a blizzard, a recovering addict discovers a kidnapped child hidden in a car belonging to one of the people inside the building which sets her on a terrifying struggle to identify who among them is the kidnapper.
cast.title: No Exit

details.biography:
Danny Ramirez (born September 17, 1992) is an American actor. He is best known as Wes in The Gifted, Mario Martinez in On My Block, Joaquin Torres / Falcon in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, and Lt. Mickey "Fanboy" Garcia in Top Gun: Maverick (2022). Ramirez portrays Manny in The Last of Us (2025).

Description above from the Wikipedia article Danny Ramirez, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Danny Ramirez
